channel.title: [request] firecape with moving water or stars
channel.description: i have seen the tut before, but now i can't find it. Can someone post it or tell me where it is? thanks

item.title: [request] firecape with moving water or stars
item.dc:creator: @blazefire blazefire
item.description:
@blazefire wrote:

[quote=“csrsniper254, post:7, topic:50860”]The tutorial was removed.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2007, 12:19:58 AM[/size][hr]Your lucky I still have this…

Credits to Billysmither for original tutorial
Here is what you do…

Open:
Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3.java

Search for:

public static final int[] method371(int i)

Directly below that add:

if (i == 40) { i = 34; }[/quote] Thanks soo much for this!

Read full topic

item.title: [request] firecape with moving water or stars
item.dc:creator: @jonyo jonyo
item.description:
@jonyo wrote:

csrsniper254:

Credits to Billysmither for original tutorial

it actually wasn’t billysmither who came up with it… I think it was slysoft of ryokumino (something like that lol) but ya thats right… you can do a lot of things with that like make most textures fire by putting in

if (i >= 0) { i = 40; }

then most things will be fire

item.title: [request] firecape with moving water or stars
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

The tutorial was removed.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2007, 12:19:58 AM[/size][hr]Your lucky I still have this…

Credits to Billysmither for original tutorial
Here is what you do…

Open:
Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3.java

Search for:

public static final int[] method371(int i)

Directly below that add:

if (i == 40) { i = 34; }
